name: Gone Dreams
description:
You take on the role of a young Harold, who will go on a long adventure. Make decisions, follow the story and characters.

At the moment, only the demo version is available. It includes a full prologue, where you can get acquainted with the game and decide for yourself whether it is worth your attention.


Features:

  • Very interesting and dynamic story will not make you bored.
  • Each character has a story. And you will be able to learn.
  • The soundtrack conveys the atmosphere of the middle ages.
  • The demo version includes a full prologue, where you can get acquainted with the game and decide whether it is worth it.
  • Turn-based battles in the style of all the old-fashioned JRPG.
  • Low system requirements.

And yes, we use standard resources. Gameplay may differ from that shown in the demo.
